title: [Placements] withdraw application
content:
How do I withdraw my application from the pesu placements app for a company
The test is after 4 days but it 
doesnâ€™t show on the app

comments.body: Just go and inform the placement cell about it. They will remove your name.

Can I mail them?
If yes could you specify which mail id exactly
You can but most of the time they forget to check and reply all the emails: You can reply to pesuplacements@pes.edu
I tried sending it but it says they donâ€™t receive mails, is there any alternate approach?
then, go meet them in college. there is no other way. they got 1000s of mails. they cannot sit and see each email
